internalServerError: We are sorry, but something went wrong. Our team has been notified, and we are working to fix the issue. Please try again later.
badRequest: Oops! The request you made was invalid. Please check your input and try again.
unauthorized: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this resource. Please make sure you have the necessary permissions.
notFound: The resource you are looking for could not be found. Please verify the URL or try again later.
notUnique: These emails are already in use.
